item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:2 Chances: Lyft’s estimated fair value is US$35.37 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures Risks: The company’s liquidity position raises major concerns Should broader conditions become squeezed, the ridesharing industry could become commoditized, impacting Lyft’s competitive distinction Score:2 chances characters count - risks characters count = 2
